All set! Your Plex Media Server is worki: All set! Your Plex Media Server is working hard to find your media and make it beautiful. Grab the Plex app for all your favourite devices to get the most out of Plex and start streaming everywhere!
All {1} settings and customization will: All {1} settings and customisation will be reset and restored to their default state.
All {productName} settings and customiza: All {productName} settings and customisation will be reset and restored to their default state. Other {productName} instances will not be affected.
All {productName} settings and customisation will be reset and restored to their default state. This will affect other {productName} instances.
Analyzes all the media files in the libr: Analyses all the media files in the library. The analysis captures information about the media which helps Plex decide how to optimally play back the media.
Any {1} settings and customization made: Any {1} settings and customisation made in this {1} instance will not be synchronised with other {1} instances.  This is because we have detected you have previously saved settings from a newer version of {1}.

Change refresh rate of display to match: Change refresh rate of display to match video when playing in full screen.
Changes to {productName} settings and cu: Changes to {productName} settings and customisation will no longer synchronise with other {productName} instances.

Choose \"Optimize...\" on items in your: Choose "Optimise..." on items in your library and optimised versions will appear here.
Choose what you’d like to have in your s: Choose what you’d like to have in your sidebar navigation menu. (You’ll always have easy access to everything, so you can make changes and further customise your menu later.)

Generate a URL for all of your friends’: Generate a URL for all of your friends’ Watchlists. With this URL, you’ll be able to add your friends’ Watchlisted titles to all of your favourite services.
Generate your own unique URL for your Wa: Generate your own unique URL for your Watchlist. With your URL, you’ll be able to add your Watchlist titles to all of your favourite services.

Hooked on home automation? With a Plex P: Hooked on home automation? With a Plex Pass, you can setup "webhooks" - Have Plex dim the lights when you start a movie, or send a tweet after you finish an episode of your favourite TV programme.
Keeping Plex on top may cause problems s: Keeping Plex on top may cause problems switching between maximised and full screen window appearances. Disable this setting if you encounter problems.

Manage your optimized versions in {1}Opt: Manage your optimised versions in {1}Optimised Versions Settings{2}.
Optimized Versions requires Plex Media S: Optimised Versions requires Plex Media Server {1} or later.
Organize, beautify, stream, and share yo: Organise, beautify, stream, and share your personal collection of movies, TV, music, and photos anywhere, on all your devices. To get started, download our free Plex Media Server software on the device where you store your media.

With Plex Pass and a digital tuner, you: With Plex Pass and a digital tuner, you can record over-the-air broadcast TV and watch your favorite programmes, films, news, and sports on any device, anywhere in the world. Cut the cord and love TV again.
With Plex, you’re just one click away fr: With Plex, you’re just one click away from streaming virtually any film or TV programme, no matter where it lives. Just tell us your favourite streaming services and we’ll take care of the rest.
With a TIDAL subscription you can add Al: With a TIDAL subscription you can add albums, artists, tracks and videos to My TIDAL to keep track of your favourite music.
Your favourite sources will appear here. Any source in the MORE menu below can be saved here for quick access.
Your selected services will be prioritiz: Your selected services will be prioritised within your results and recommendations throughout Plex to help customise your experience.
